root.swedish: S: vad kan jag hjälpa dig med U: jag skulle vilja köpa en hund S: okej / har du funderat på vilken hund som du vill ha U: nej men jag har funderat på vissa egenskaper S: aha / okej / vad tycker du är viktigt hos en hund då U: det är viktigt att den är bra med barn S: okej U: och att den är enkel att träna S: okej då kanske du skulle vara intresserad av en golden retriever U: ja det kan jag vara / men det är också viktigt att den inte dräglar S: okej / då kanske man skulle överväga en schäfer istället U: ja / om schäfern fäller mindre än en golden retriever S: ja men det gör den absolut U: ja men då låter schäfer jättebra S: skulle du vara intressead av att jämföra schäfer med någon annan hund / exempelvis pudel U: nej pudel är jag inte intresserad av men jag skulle vilja jämföra den med en labrador S: okej / i vilket hänseende då U: eh / ja / att den skall vara bra med främlingar S: ja U: och att den inte är för beskyddande S: okej / då ska du absolut välja pudel U: okej / då tar vi en pudel S: okej / vad bra
root.english: S: what can I help you with U: I would like to buy a dog S: okay / have you thought about which dog you want U: no / but I have been thinking about certain qualities S: aha / okay / what do you think is important for a dog then U: it is important that it is good with children S: okay U: and that it is easy to train S: okay then maybe you would be interested in a golden retriever U: yes I can be / but it is also important not to drool S: okay / then maybe you should consider a German Shepherd instead U: yes / if the german shepherd sheds less than a golden retriever S: yes / but it absolutely does U: yes / but then german shepherds sound great S: would you be interested in comparing german shepherds with any other dog / for example poodle U: no / poodle I am not interested in / but I would like to compare it with a labrador S: okay / in what way U: eh / yes / that it should be good with strangers S: yes U: and that it is not too protective S: okay / then you should definitely choose a poodle U: okay / then we'll take a poodle [laughing] S: okay / good
root.distillation:
S: what can I help you with U: I would like to buy a dog S: okay / have you thought about which dog you want U: no / but I have been thinking about certain qualities S: aha / okay / what do you think is important for a dog then U: it is important that it is good with children S: okay U: and that it is easy to train S: okay then maybe you would be interested in a golden retriever U: yes I can be / but it is also important not to drool S: okay / then maybe you should consider a German Shepherd instead U: yes / if the german shepherd sheds less than a golden retriever S: yes / but it absolutely does U: yes / but then german shepherds sound great S: would you be interested in comparing german shepherds with any other dog / for example poodle U: no / poodle I am not interested in / but I would like to compare it with a labrador S: okay / in what way do you want to compare german shepard with labrador U: eh / yes / that it should be good with strangers S: yes U: and that it is not too protective S: okay / then you should definitely choose a poodle
U: okay / then we'll take a poodle [laughing] S: okay / good
root.final: S: what can I help you with U: I would like to buy a dog S: okay / have you thought about which dog you want U: no / but I have been thinking about certain qualities S: okay / what do you think is important for a dog U: it is important that it is good with children S: okay U: and that it is easy to train S: okay then maybe you would be interested in a golden retriever U: yes I can be / but it is also important not to drool S: okay / then maybe you should consider a German Shepherd instead U: yes / if the german shepherd sheds less than a golden retriever S: yes / german shepard sheds less than a golden retrieve U: yes / but then german shepherds sound great S: would you be interested in comparing german shepherds with any other dog / for example poodle U: no / poodle I am not interested in / but I would like to compare it with a labrador S: okay / in what way do you want to compare german shepard with labrador U: eh / yes / that it should be good with strangers S: yes U: and that it is not too protective S: okay / then you should choose labrador U: okay / then we'll take a labrador S: okay
